original_text:
For you will have a covenant with the stones of the field,
    and the wild animals will be at peace with you.
korean_text: 들에 있는 돌이 너와 언약을 맺겠고 들짐승이 너와 화목하게 살 것이니라

sentences.original_text: For you will have a covenant
with the stones of the field
and the wild animals will be at peace
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 야생 동물들은 평화를 누릴 것이다
